participant_1.background:
My relationship with my boss is still in its early stages.
I start my day by feeding my dog, who is always excited to see me.
I read a lot and spend my time on community activities.
I love the Fourth of July because it's a day to celebrate our country and spend time with friends and family.
i m a disappointment to my family.

participant_2.background:
My cycling collection is my most prized possession.
I should have been a farmer, growing my own beef.
i am pretty poor financially.
I started to go jogging every morning to try to lose weight.
i am going to school for writing.

content.text: Good morning! How are you doing today?
Morning! I am doing well. How about you?
I am doing well, thank you! I am looking forward to the weekend.
Same here! I have a lot of plans for the weekend.
Oh that is exciting! What do you have planned?
I am going to go to the park with my dog and then I am going to go shopping.
That sounds like a great time! I love going to the park with my dog.
Me too! It is so much fun to watch them run around and play.
I have a cycling collection that is my most prized possession.
That is really cool! I have always wanted to learn how to bike.
It is not too difficult! You should definitely give it a try.
I think I will! Thank you for the suggestion.
You are welcome! What are you going to school for?
I am going to school for writing.
Oh that is great! I love to write.
Me too! It is my favorite hobby.
What do you like to write about?
I like to write short stories and poetry.
That is really cool! I would love to read some of your work sometime.
Thank you! I would love to share it with you.
